response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us at $1,500,000, but considering its significance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We are offering you the chance to own this remarkable product at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a significant discount that reflects our commitment to ensuring you receive unparalleled quality and value. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
